items.content:
Senior ETL/SQL Developer

About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Senior
Role: System Administrator
Industry: Agile Software Development
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private
Company: TopDevz | Sacramento, CA

Remote details

Office Location: Sacramento, CA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

sql-server
tableau
powerbi
mongodb
etl
sysadmin

Job description

We are looking for an experienced, senior, ETL developer who is excited to work on one of our many client projects. The successful candidate will have extensive experience in ETL processing, PowerBI and Tableau, and creating intuitive dashboards to gain insights into the data.  This is a remote position (US / Canada only).

Skills & Requirements

The following skills are required:

  1. Very experienced (5+ Years) in ETL processing
  2. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Tableau
  3. Very experienced (5+ Years) in PowerBI
  4. Very experienced (5+ Years) in SQL Server
  5. Experience (2+ years) with MongoDB
  6. Big bonus points if you have WhereScape RED experience.
  7. Knowledge of a typical development lifecycle (development to deployment) using typical industry tools, e.g. Atlassian JIRA and BitBucket
  8. Good written and verbal communication skills
  9. Significant attention to detail when writing code, including good commenting and code documentation skills
Apply now

About TopDevz

TopDevz is a boutique software development consulting agency. We place major focus on not just delivering excellent value and top-notch software to our clients, but also the happiness of our team. We are providing a friendly, remote work environment as well as a suite of interesting and challenging projects to work on.

Benefits

  • Incredible Colleagues
  • Competitive Compensation
  • Friendly Work Environment
  • Interesting and Challenging Projects

items.title: Senior Media Server Engineer
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=8, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Senior Media Server Engineer


Imajion Co


Live anywhere, work remotely with Imajion to develop iindustry-leadingcommunications solutions for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction sector leveraging Mixed Reality technology such as the HoloLens. Come help us build the first digital teleportation tool for AEC and make your mark in the communications technology landscape with mixed reality. Travel to Barcelona, Los Angeles, Munich, or Zadar during our collaborative development retreats designed to help fuel inspiration, wonder and fun because we want your work to feel like play.


Responsibilities:


* Integration, adaptation, and extension of Kurento Media Server capabilities to facilitate Mixed Reality usage scenarios.

* Architecting Media Server back end services in support of high density client connections consisting of hundreds of simultaneous video/voice connections that will also carry composited Virtual 3D content.

* Mentor and help us envision where the future of communications is headed, particularly with respect to MR and VR.





Requirements:


* Familiarity with Kurento Media Server or similar Media Server implementations.

* Deep understanding of video streaming and associated protocols such as WebRTC, RTSP, Video Over IP and like communications streaming systems

* Experience with video compositing (2D a must, 3D a bonus)

* Recent extensive C++ development experience used to adapt and extend Media Server solutions.


See more jobs at Imajion Co

items.title: Admin for Sponsorships
items.content:
Job Requirements

This is a full-time remote admin position for someone with exquisite organizational and administrative skills who loves collaborating and communicating with people.

The job requires written and spoken fluency in English (any other language skills are a plus).

About Us

We are a small software company with team members working all over the world. Our goal is to help rid the world of bad software - not a small task! We believe that providing best-in-class customer support is just as important as the software and services we provide. Our support staff is the face of our organization - the manifestation of our ideals and love for our users.

We have grown slowly and remained agile for over ten years now, and that's something we really treasure. When you join our team, you join our circle of friends.

About You

You are Accurate and Organized
To be successful in this role you'll need to be focused and detail-oriented, both with tasks, as well as with numbers. Project management, from taking a new task, researching it, figuring out the steps required to deliver the work on time, and problem solving are extremely important. You'll be dealing with at least 250 sponsorships a year, so you are passionate about maintaining reliable systems for recording and tracking multiple details. Figuring out efficient logistics and work flows is fun for you.

You are an Excellent Communicator
We are a remote company and you will be working with organizers from every corner of the planet. This means you have great communication skills, particular written. You are someone who is clear and concise, and able to synthasize information from various places and make it easy for others to review and respond.

You have Enthusiasm for Learning
This job does not require previous knowledge of User Experience or our software (though that is a plus!), however you are someone interested in listening and learning about these things in order to help assist the Marketing Team in meeting their goals. You know how to absorb new information AND ask the right questions to help build your knowledge. You have the humility and self-confidence needed to ask for help. You own your mistakes, and use them as opportunities for growth.

You Love Helping People
Our company strives to focus on empathy in our interactions with each other, as well as the vendors you will work with in administration. You know how to balance the importance of administrative process with caring for the needs of an individual person. Your love of people also means you are a strong and fun team player.

The Work

You should take the time to read our what it's like to work at Balsamiq page. It will help you decide if we are a good match for you.

You will be a member of our Admin Team and work collaboratively with our Marketing Team, coordinating remotely with co-workers and event organizers from around the world.

As a member of the Admin Team, you will help join our mission to be caretakers of Balsamiq. We take pride in making sure the company is legally and financially healthy, and that are co-workers our taken care of.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • managing a $350,000 a year budget; making sure spending is meeting the goals and guidelines of the Marketing Team
  • carefully following guidelines for vetting each sponsorship request
  • dealing with all the communication related to each sponsorship request
  • completing payments and maintaining accurate records of contracts, w-9s, and invoices for all sponsorships
  • giving out promo codes, discount codes, and extended trials related to sponsorships
  • creating an end-of-year report to post on our blog
  • coordinating with our marketing team for special requirements for some events
  • helping organize our booth presence at 5+ conferences each year
  • mailing or electronically sending out out SWAG to special customers and for some events
  • coordinating production of business cards and SWAG for sponsorships, staff, retreats, and other occasions
  • reviewing and optimize our sponsorship processes regularly

If you still have time, we could use your help project-managing a few other little and medium projects.

Starting salary: $50,000/year (negotiable). We offer great benefits and have a generous profit sharing program.

items.title: MySQL Database Engineer
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=16, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
MySQL Database Engineer

DevOps
Anywhere in the U.S.
Company: Variphy
Full Time

Overview

Variphy is looking for a full-time MySQL Database Developer to join our 100% remote, agile team.

We develop a Java-based web application called ‘Variphy Insight’ that is packaged for deployment onto Windows, Linux, and Mac OS machines.  Some of the core functionality of Variphy Insight involves software-automated configuration, schema management, and querying of MySQL (and SQL Server) databases from on-premises customer installations.  Thus, for this role, we are looking for candidates that not only have experience setting-up, administering, and troubleshooting production MySQL database servers, but also have experience in the realm of database development — optimizing schema and performance, developing disaster recovery/migration strategies, and providing specialized advice to your peers on the product development team.

Additionally, since SQL Server is also an option for Variphy Insight, any experience involving SQL Server (in addition to MySQL) would give a candidate lots of extra credit.  If you have not had much experience with SQL Server, we are looking for a candidate that would be eager to learn SQL Server-specific configurations, pitfalls, etc. starting on Day 1.

Although our customers here at Variphy install our product on their preferred operating system, Linux (particularly Ubuntu) is becoming the most popular choice.  Thus, in addition to MySQL experience, an ideal candidate for this role would also have experience and comfort working in a Linux environment. If you use desktop Linux at home or in your current role, we’d love to chat.  And if you have had experience as more of a systems administrator (in addition to MySQL experience), we’d really love to chat!

Finally, since Variphy is a 100% remote team, in order to thrive in this position, you should be a team player who communicates well, makes great use of your time, and will succeed in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities
  • Serve as subject matter expert for software development and customer support teams for all things MySQL and Microsoft SQL Server
  • Provide guidance and technical escalation assistance to customer support engineering team
  • Work with software development team to optimize configuration, connectivity, schema, and queries for MySQL and Microsoft SQL Server database servers
  • Setup and oversee all Variphy-internal and customer production database servers
  • Recommend database software configurations for various database sizes and use cases
  • Develop and direct setup of redundant and robust database systems
  • Develop data migration and recovery strategies for use by the customer support engineering team

    • General Qualifications
    Must Haves
    • Ability and desire to work remotely
    • 3+ years of professional DBA and/or systems administration experience
    • Ability to manage multiple, simultaneous issues
    • Excellent team-player who is always happy to help others
    • Strong written and verbal communication skills

      • Good-To-Have/Bonus Points
      • Previous experience working remotely
      • An engineering/technical degree or similar
      • Working with customers – both technical and non-technical

        • Technical Requirements
        Must Haves
        • Expert-level experience with MySQL (version 5.x and ideally 8.0), including installation, configuration, upgrades, migration, backup and recovery, monitoring, and performance tuning
        • Proficient in relational database/schema design, SQL query and stored procedure development and enhancement
        • Experience in a Linux environment, particularly involving system-level configuration and monitoring

          • Good-To-Have/Bonus Points
          • Experience with Microsoft SQL Server (version 2012 and later)
          • Proficient with VMWare ESX or similar
          • Cloud hosting experience (DigitalOcean, Linode, AWS, etc)
          • Experience with Cisco Unified Communications/Collaboration
          • Experience with Chef or Puppet for configuration management
          • Migrating databases/data from MySQL to Microsoft SQL Server (or vice versa)
          • Experience with other database types (Informix, Postgres, Mongo, etc.)
          • Experience with Cisco IOS-based ASAs, routers, or switches

            •  

            Ready to apply?

            Please read the full job posting and provide any details requested by the employer. A thoughtful cover letter greatly increases your chances of getting hired

            For this position, please send your job application to: jobs.engineering@variphy.com

About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Senior, Lead
Role: Database Administrator, System Administrator
Industry: Software Development
Company size: 201-500 people
Company type: Private

Remote details

Technologies

database-administrationoraclesqlsql-serversysadmin

About Surge

Surge is an onshore provider of custom web, cloud, mobile, digital, and desktop software development and consulting services to clients in every industry, from hot startups to Fortune 500 companies.

Founded in 2007, and listed on the Inc. 5000 list of America’s fastest growing companies for five straight years, Surge has successfully delivered hundreds of software products, apps, and solutions to its clients using a proven agile/scrum development process combined with an elite group of North American software professionals.

Simply put, Surge offers America’s best software engineers, on demand, at rates 30-50% less than the competition.

Benefits

  • Great Pay
  • Choose Your Hours
  • Work From Home
  • Work With Happy People
  • Zero Commute
  • See Your Family More
  • Travel While You Work
  • Software Provided

items.title: Operations Admin Team Member
tags: DBG:surround``remot 3N OR(options, avail, allow) NOT encourag
DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=13, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Operations Admin Team Member

Company: Relationship Development

Doyou LOVE getting things DONE? Do you love the feeling of checking those boxesoff your to do list? Do you love to see your good work come to life in theworld? Do you love to implement? Does figuring out the “HOW” of how to getsomething done excite you? Do you thrive on getting things executed? Do youLOVE systems and processes for streamlining tasks?


Doyou get tremendous satisfaction from seeing people’s lives become betterbecause of work that YOU did? Do you LOVE a fast-paced, dynamic environment whereyou can get LOTS of things done at once? Do you get bored when there’s only ONEthing to do? DO you LIGHT up when you get to move a whole bunch of stuffforward to completion?
Areyou someone that is looking for a meaningful career and not just another job?An organization where you aren’t a number, but instead a valued teammate? Acareer that is as rewarding as it is challenging? If your head is currentlynodding yes to all of these then this may be the long term career opportunityyou have been searching for. 

ROLE


We are looking for a key member of our operations team, anoperations implementation team member. In this position, you will beresponsible for executing and implementing operations tasks in support of ourprograms, events and marketing. 
The operations team member is an implementation role thathandles the tasks surrounding the creation, delivery, maintenance, and supportof our operations, programs, and events. This team member must keep our missionfront and center while executing the day-to-day tasks that keep our systems andprocesses moving forward in a timely, orderly, and efficient manner. 

The operations team member will work with the OperationsTeam to standardize processes and procedures to ensure scalability.
This means executing within the daily operations,communicating bottle-necks and holes in processes so they can be repaired,communicating with all team members, an ensuring that there are clear pathwaysto results.


Responsibilities

AssistProject Managers with all work flow to keep things moving forward so nothinggets dropped.


Implementand execute on all operations tasks that need to get done to support ourdelivery of programs and events.


Creating,editing, proofreading documents.


Navigatingcalendars, call schedules, timelines, and project plans.


Following upon outstanding issues with vendors, suppliers, and event sites.


Assistingwith product, site, and logistical research.


Communicatingand answering questions for team members.


Updating andmaintaining SOPs and assisting in the creation and maintenance of our onlinelearning base.


Work hand inhand with the project managers daily, to ensure that nothing gets missed andremove any blocks so that things can keep moving forward.


Bring yourRESOURCEFUL and PASSIONATE can-do attitude to anything that needs to get donefor this organization!


An expert increating and maintaining systems and processes to improve efficiencies, fillholes and catch what got missed so it doesn’t happen again.


Able toadapt quickly and explore new frontiers, as well as being able to see newopportunities


Able toorganize and execute on multiple operations tasks simultaneously


Strongbackground in executing and getting things done that you’ve not done before, asyou will be faced with juggling many tasks and solving challenges every singleday


Upholdingthe commitments, we make


Bringing astandard of excellence. Having a “whatever it takes” approach. And being a teamplayer who loves to help other team members get stuff done!


Keep theProject Management tool moving smoothly and keep it organized.


Keep SOPsupdated and create new ones where SOPs don’t exist yet.


Stay currentand available in SLACK, our messaging app, during your working hours. 


RESULTS
Take stuff off of the plates of the owners and projectmanagers to keep them moving forward


If a project is stuck or tasks are not getting done, removethe log-jam and keep things moving forward


Be resourceful and bring your unique brilliance to helpRelationship Development have the impact we need to have.


Create that peace of mind in the team that we know that“you’ve got this”!


REQUIREMENTS

At least 2 years’ experience in operations andimplementation


Excellent skills in at least one of the majorproject management software platforms (we use Asana)


Technology maven (you do awesome with yourtech and easily pick up new tech)


You take 100% personal responsibility foryour life and your outcomes


ABSOLUTE Integrity


Do “whatever it takes” attitude


Perks:


Compensation: This full time position has a salary of $33,000 per year.


Remote: This is a remote position, which allows you to workfrom anywhere.

*This job is notall-inclusive and certain activities, duties, or responsibilities may berequired of the employee as needed.

For the full role description and application, click here: forms.relationshipdevelopment.org/operations-team-member-role-app

items.title: Oracle DBA 100%Remote work
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=8, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
RapidIT, Inc. has been established to provide computer systems, business applications software and related services for clients in different industries. Adapting the latest technologies, we provide information system solutions to the business problems of our clients. Our company is currently expanding its operations, to which end we are conducting an extensive recruitment through media and advertising.

We presently have an immediate need for a Oracle DBA, interview guaranteed for the perfect fit.

Job Title : Oracle DBA

Location : Bellevue, WA.

Duration :Long term

100% remote but we need local consultant

Description:

8+ years of experience as an Oracle DBA

Oracle Certified Associate and Oracle Certified Professional

RDBMS data administration certificate

Windows, Unix and Linux experience

Experience with GoldenGate, RAC, RMAN and Data Guard

Minimum Education Required: U.S. Equivalent Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a closely related field.

Kindly respond to the above requirement with your name, resume, contact number and current location information to speed up the screening process.

items.title: Full Stack Developer (C#/ React/SQL Server/Azure) at AssureSign (Atlanta, GA)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=71, c=8, mobile=4, go=0, nodejs=8, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=1, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=48}
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Software Development / Engineering
Company size: 11-50 people

Technologies

c#javascriptazurereacttypescript

Job description

Javascript/C# Software Developer

Job Description

Growing software company looking for a self-starting, experienced, and versatile software developer based in Atlanta, GA or remote.

This team meets (virtually) and is responsible for rolling out regular releases to several web, mobile, and desktop applications.  At a high level, this developer will be responsible for:

  • designing and implementing new features and functionality for both new and existing web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • conducting R&D with new libraries, frameworks, and technologies
  • reviewing code and mentoring junior level developers
  • fixing bugs (nobody likes it, but we’ve all got to do it)
  • contributing to product documentation
  • responding to more technical questions from customers than we care about
  • communicating openly and effectively with co-workers and customers

We utilize agile methodologies and typically follow a 2-week release cadence. In addition to our daily scrum meetings via Skype, we also meet weekly (virtually) to share our progress with the entire time. Once or twice a year we meet for in-person for meetings/ training.

We make heavy use of Visual Studio Online for backlog and issue tracking. We love Open Source, but we don’t shy away from spending money to make sure we have the right tools for the job.  We aren’t afraid of trying new technology and make a point of regularly evaluating new tooling, libraries, and frameworks. 

Work schedules are flexible, but reasonable availability for meetings, collaboration, and customer support during core business hours is required.

Skills & Requirements

Our ideal candidate will exhibit:

  • proven experience developing large, rich JavaScript applications
  • demonstrable skills working with responsive design, HTML 5, and CSS
  • a solid command and understanding of C# and ASP.NET
  • the ability to work easily in a variety of programming languages and environments to support a variety of web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • an approach of always writing code as if they are the ones that will have to maintain it over the long haul (because who knows, maybe they will be…)
  • a serious interest in learning about and trying out new technologies and platforms

In addition, the following would be beneficial:

  • a working knowledge of SQL (ideally SQL Server)
  • experience developing JavaScript applications using TypeScript
  • experience working with cloud services, SQL Database, and BLOB storage in Microsoft Azure
  • professional-level written and verbal communications skills

If you have the experience and skills listed, we’d love to hear from you.

NO recruiters please.

About Us

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 400 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Our Technology Stack

Web Applications

On the server-side, our web applications typically leverage ASP.NET (C#) and SQL Server (typically Azure SQL Database).  With a service oriented architectural style, we rely on Nancy FX to develop our light-weight .NET-based HTTP services.

On the client-side, we make heavy use of JavaScript to create rich client-side experiences.  Most of our code is written in TypeScript using React and Redux.  We typically utilize a Gulp-based build system to generate our client-side code (CSS, JavaScript) from our source TypeScript and LESS files and to maximize our control over the build process.

Mobile Applications

We currently offer native mobile applications that work with our core SaaS product and specifically target: iOS, Android, and the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

Desktop Applications

Our .NET based Windows desktop applications are designed to complement our core SaaS web application and make heavy use of the web-based API for our core application.

Why Work at AssureSign?

Our product: We’re customer centric and committed to continuous improvements to stand out from the competition.  The backlog never gets smaller, but the product continues to evolve and improve.

Our Team: We’re team players - We’re committed to the growth of our company and product and are supportive of one another.  We’re looking for a motivated developer to join us who thrives in a fast pace environment. 

We’re passionate about what we do, and have an ‘all hands on deck’ mentality when it comes to the success of our company and product.  We adapt, we find solutions, and are willing to question assumptions and think outside the box. We are looking for someone who shares those characteristics and is truly passionate about coding.

Benefits

In addition to competitive pay, AssureSign offers the following benefits:

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with company match and immediate full vesting
  • And an open vacation/time off policy: yes, you read that correctly
Apply now
Ask a question

About AssureSign

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 180 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Benefits

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with matching and full vesting
  • Open vacation/time off policy

items.content:
Operations Admin Team Member

Headquarters: Bucks County, PA
URL: http://RelationshipDevelopment.org

Doyou LOVE getting things DONE? Do you love the feeling of checking those boxesoff your to do list? Do you love to see your good work come to life in theworld? Do you love to implement? Does figuring out the “HOW” of how to getsomething done excite you? Do you thrive on getting things executed? Do youLOVE systems and processes for streamlining tasks?


Doyou get tremendous satisfaction from seeing people’s lives become betterbecause of work that YOU did? Do you LOVE a fast-paced, dynamic environment whereyou can get LOTS of things done at once? Do you get bored when there’s only ONEthing to do? DO you LIGHT up when you get to move a whole bunch of stuffforward to completion?
Areyou someone that is looking for a meaningful career and not just another job?An organization where you aren’t a number, but instead a valued teammate? Acareer that is as rewarding as it is challenging? If your head is currentlynodding yes to all of these then this may be the long term career opportunityyou have been searching for. 

ROLE


We are looking for a key member of our operations team, anoperations implementation team member. In this position, you will beresponsible for executing and implementing operations tasks in support of ourprograms, events and marketing. 
The operations team member is an implementation role thathandles the tasks surrounding the creation, delivery, maintenance, and supportof our operations, programs, and events. This team member must keep our missionfront and center while executing the day-to-day tasks that keep our systems andprocesses moving forward in a timely, orderly, and efficient manner. 

The operations team member will work with the OperationsTeam to standardize processes and procedures to ensure scalability.
This means executing within the daily operations,communicating bottle-necks and holes in processes so they can be repaired,communicating with all team members, an ensuring that there are clear pathwaysto results.


Responsibilities

AssistProject Managers with all work flow to keep things moving forward so nothinggets dropped.


Implementand execute on all operations tasks that need to get done to support ourdelivery of programs and events.


Creating,editing, proofreading documents.


Navigatingcalendars, call schedules, timelines, and project plans.


Following upon outstanding issues with vendors, suppliers, and event sites.


Assistingwith product, site, and logistical research.


Communicatingand answering questions for team members.


Updating andmaintaining SOPs and assisting in the creation and maintenance of our onlinelearning base.


Work hand inhand with the project managers daily, to ensure that nothing gets missed andremove any blocks so that things can keep moving forward.


Bring yourRESOURCEFUL and PASSIONATE can-do attitude to anything that needs to get donefor this organization!


An expert increating and maintaining systems and processes to improve efficiencies, fillholes and catch what got missed so it doesn’t happen again.


Able toadapt quickly and explore new frontiers, as well as being able to see newopportunities


Able toorganize and execute on multiple operations tasks simultaneously


Strongbackground in executing and getting things done that you’ve not done before, asyou will be faced with juggling many tasks and solving challenges every singleday


Upholdingthe commitments, we make


Bringing astandard of excellence. Having a “whatever it takes” approach. And being a teamplayer who loves to help other team members get stuff done!


Keep theProject Management tool moving smoothly and keep it organized.


Keep SOPsupdated and create new ones where SOPs don’t exist yet.


Stay currentand available in SLACK, our messaging app, during your working hours. 


RESULTS
Take stuff off of the plates of the owners and projectmanagers to keep them moving forward


If a project is stuck or tasks are not getting done, removethe log-jam and keep things moving forward


Be resourceful and bring your unique brilliance to helpRelationship Development have the impact we need to have.


Create that peace of mind in the team that we know that“you’ve got this”!


REQUIREMENTS

At least 2 years’ experience in operations andimplementation


Excellent skills in at least one of the majorproject management software platforms (we use Asana)


Technology maven (you do awesome with yourtech and easily pick up new tech)


You take 100% personal responsibility foryour life and your outcomes


ABSOLUTE Integrity


Do “whatever it takes” attitude


Perks:


Compensation: This full time position has a salary of $33,000 per year.


Remote: This is a remote position, which allows you to workfrom anywhere.

*This job is notall-inclusive and certain activities, duties, or responsibilities may berequired of the employee as needed.

To apply: For the full role description and application, click here: https://forms.relationshipdevelopment.org/operations-team-member-role-app

items.title: Freelance Remote Database Administration Writer
items.content:
Freelance Remote Database Administration Writer

Company: Wpromote
Location: U.S.

Job Type: Freelance

Description

We are looking for a detail-oriented, efficient, and reliable remote database administration expert to add to our team!

You Will Be

  • Communicating directly with and taking direction from Wpromote’s SEO and Content Marketing Managers
  • Writing monthly batches of content that will include technical and informative blogs about our client's products and services plus industry news
  • Performing research on your client and becoming a brand expert
  • Performing research on your assigned monthly topics to create unique, quality content
  • Utilizing SEO best practices in your writing including the body, headings, and titles
  • Adhering to brand guides, matching the writing style of our client(s), which is technical in nature, and using verbiage that speaks to our target market(s)
  • Reviewing and proofing your work to ensure your copy is high-quality, clean, and error-free
  • Making edits and revisions as needed

You Must Have

  • Bachelor's degree; English, Writing, or related field preferred
  • Extensive experience writing on database administration — we are looking for an industry expert
  • Experience with remote DBA, operating system support, database and server monitoring, and applications support for Oracle EBS, Exchange, SharePoint, and Microsoft Business Intelligence
  • The lingo down of this niche market; knowledge about the industry and the ability to deliver high-level news
  • Knowledge of SEO best practices and experience writing SEO-optimized copy
  • Solid MS Office skills
  • Proven experience writing to different target audiences and adjusting your writing style as needed
  • The capacity to answer emails in a prompt manner and occasionally talk on the phone (reminder: This is a remote/freelance position)

Application Instructions

If you feel like you’d be great fit for this role, we’d like to hear from you! Apply by emailing [email protected], and please include the following in your application (failure to do so will result in not being considered for the position):

• “DBA Writer” in the email subject line
• Your résumé
• Cover letter explaining why you would be the ideal writer for our client
• 3-5 relevant writing samples


We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Agile Software Development
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private

Technologies

asp.netasp.net-mvcc#sql-servervb.net

Job description

We are looking for an experienced, senior, full-stack ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server engineer, who is excited to work on one of our many client projects - both greenfield (new) projects as well as legacy (support) projects in that technology stack. This is a remote position.

Skills & Requirements

The following skills are required:

  1. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Full-Stack Development: Front-end and Back-end
  2. Very experienced (5+ Years) in ASP.NET MVC
  3. Very experienced (5+ Years) in C#
  4. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Microsoft SQL Server
  5. Experience with VB
  6. Experience with Entity Framework
  7. Experience with JavaScript and typical JS Frameworks (i.e. Angular, Knockout etc.)
  8. Experience with Bootstrap
  9. Knowledge of a typical development lifecycle (development to deployment) using typical industry tools, e.g. Atlassian JIRA and BitBucket
  10. Good written and verbal communication skills
  11. Significant attention to detail when writing code, including good commenting and code documentation skills
  12. Not required, but a big Plus: Experience with other SQL RDBMS (e.g. Postgres)
Apply now
Ask a question

About TopDevz

TopDevz is a boutique software development consulting agency. We place major focus on not just delivering excellent value and top-notch software to our clients, but also the happiness of our team. We are providing a friendly, remote work environment as well as a suite of interesting and challenging projects to work on.

Benefits

  • Incredible Colleagues
  • Competitive Compensation
  • Friendly Work Environment
  • Interesting and Challenging Projects

items.content:
Magento Developer / West Yorkshire and Remote / OOP PHP / MySQL - Jobmote

Magento Developer / West Yorkshire and Remote / OOP PHP / MySQL

X4 Group

Magento Developer required West Yorkshire and Remote / OOP PHP / MySQL / CSS / HTML / JavaScript / MVC

I wondered if I might be able to interest you in a new Permanent opportunity I have for a Magento Developer , based in the West Yorkshire area.

Role: Magento Developer (Frontend, Backend or Full Stack)
Location: West Yorkshire (Remote working permitted as long as can commute to the office occasionally)
Salary: £30,000 to £50,000

My client is a vibrant digital agency , which has experienced a rapid period of growth and expansion. With a move into in-house products and applications there is new opening within the team for a skilled Magento developer who can come in and coRemote working permitted as long as can commute to the office occasionallympliment their current development team. They are constantly developing new innovative products meaning their is always scope for new projects. They pride themselves on creating a supportive and enjoyable working environment giving all employees the opportunity to flourish.

They are looking for more Mid to Senior level Magento Developers to join their fast paced ecommerce team. The ecommerce team currently consists of 4 developers, 2 online marketers, 2 content creators, frontend developers and graphic designers... Making for a great environment if you want to work together in a forward thinking team.

Ideally, they would like to find someone with a number of years experience in Magento development, this includes frontend and backend work. You will be working on the optimisation of sites, including maintenance and also developing brand new builds. They are also in the process of migrating everything to Magento 2 making this a company that likes to work in the latest technologies. Alongside the Magento work you can also be involved with other in house projects, mainly in Laravel as they have some fantastic SaaS products.

Skills

  • Magento (frontend and backend)
  • MySQL
  • OOP PHP
  • CSS
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • MVC
  • Git

Desirables

  • Laravel/Symfony
  • Bootstrap
  • Foundation

My client is looking to offer a salary of £30,000 to** £50,000** and would be keen to start interviewing from Tuesday 5th June onwards. What are you up to currently? Do you think this role could be of interest?

This is only a brief description of the role and I have a full job spec I can send across should you request it.

It would be great to discuss further, if you could send me an updated CV to I can run through the position with you in more detail. They are looking to line up interviews quite quickly so if you could let me know your availability with regards to this as well that would help.

I look forward to hearing from you

Designs, codes, tests, debugs, and documents programs leveraging Python and Java Provides comprehensive consultation to business unit and IT management and staff at the highest technical level on all phases of application programming. Overall understanding of Big Data architecture and latest trends. Works closely with client and IT management and staff to identify application development solutions, new or modified programs, reuse of existing code through the use of program development software alternatives, or integration of purchased solutions or a combination of the available alternatives. Perform project delivery functions in support of releases Responsible for delivery of medium to high complexity project work Maintain in-depth knowledge of project tools and data sources. Participate in all sprint planning, daily standups, and sprint review sessions Perform sprint demos to get stakeholder agreement that sprint deliverables meet the requirements Provide support for technical specifications Engage in operational readiness activities to ensure that project "go-live" is stable and successful Perform QA Automation functions to ensure project delivery is successful Maintain breadth of knowledge on all business processes. Communicate analytical findings/gaps/solutions to management and offer solutions to meet gaps. Manage the synthesis of large data-sets into meaningful information used to drive action. Determine opportunities and identify technical solutions to increase analytical processing efficiency. Communicate statuses, good and bad, to partners to keep them informed and engaged in the project, minimizing surprises Develops Data workflows and automated scripts in Hadoop Environment using Hive, Impala, Hue, Sqoop, Oozie. Demonstrate passion for anticipating and meeting the expectations and requirements of business partners. Ability to work with different groups to close bridges/gaps, problem solve, and develop solutions Strong accountability and desire to deliver a quality product on time, communicate statuses, or offer alternatives to meet customer objectives Skills * 10+ years' experience with: Object Oriented Design and Development (Python, Java, C#) Agile Engineering Practices Test Driven Development (TDD) Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery Refactoring SQL (Expert in any RDBMS, such as Teradata, Oracle, DB2, MSSQL) Scripting in * nix environments Database performance tuning 3+ years' experience with: Hadoop Environment and tools such as Hive, Impala, Hue, Sqoop, Oozie. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related discipline, at least eight, typically ten or more years of solid, diverse work experience in IT with a minimum of six years' experience application program development, or the equivalent in education and work experience. Other Skills: Demonstrated experience working independently with limited direction Strong written and verbal communication and a strong listener Problem solving and critical thinking Driven to deliver elegant solutions A love of data Healthcare experience is a plus. Knowledge of: Design Patterns Business Intelligence dashboard creation (Tableau, Looker, etc.) Data automation, quality testing and validation For more information please contact Erica Johns at . Since 1995, iTech Solutions Inc., has been providing IT Consulting and Direct Hire Services to the Insurance, Financial, Communications, Manufacturing and Government sectors with local offices in Connecticut, Minnesota, Colorado, Massachusetts, Tennessee, North Carolina, and New Jersey / Pennsylvania area. Our recruiting strategy is simple, if you want to find qualified IT professionals then use IT professionals to find them. So at iTech Solutions, our personnel are all career IT professionals with a wide range of IT experience. We can honestly say our staff understands the technologies, the complexities of finding and selecting the appropriate personnel and the pressures of running successful IT projects. Employer will not sponsor applicants for any employment visas, at hiring or in the future, including but not limited to H-1B visas. Corp-to-Corp or subcontract personnel will not be considered for this position. - provided by Dice

sql, data, etl, hadoop, python, scripting, sql

items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior, Lead
Role: Database Administrator, System Administrator
Industry: Software Development
Company size: 201-500 people
Company type: Private

Technologies

oracleplsqldevelopersqldatabase-administrationsysadmin

Job description

SURGE is looking for smart, self-motivated, experienced, senior automated test engineers who enjoy the freedom of telecommuting and flexible schedules, to work as long-term, consistent (40 hrs/week) independent contractors (no W2) on a variety of software development projects.

Experience Required: Remote work but willing to go onsite periodically in Sandy, UT as the client needs you to be there. We need someone already living in the area.

  • Role: Oracle PL/SQL Developer
  • Skillset: Expert in PL/SQL programming. Must have experience in Stored Procedures, handling complex SQL queries / scripts, performance analysis on large data sets / batch processing, designing / maintaining physical / logical data models & knowledge on UNIX scripts.

Only candidates located near Sandy, UT can be considered at this time as this is an onsite and remote position. 

For immediate consideration, email resume and include your cell phone number and start date: dsanderson@surgeforward.com

Apply now

About Surge

Surge is a leading provider of custom web, cloud, mobile, digital, and desktop software development and consulting services to clients in every industry, from hot startups to Fortune 500 companies. Founded in 2007, and listed on the Inc. 5000 list of America's fastest growing companies for four straight years, the Surge team has successfully delivered hundreds of software products, apps, and solutions to its clients using a proven agile/scrum development process combined with an elite group of North American software professionals. Simply put, Surge offers America's best software engineers, on demand, at rates 30-50% less than the competition.

Benefits

  • Great Pay
  • Choose Your Hours
  • Work From Home
  • Work With Happy People
  • Zero Commute
  • See Your Family More
  • Travel While You Work
  • Software Provided
